name: @wesley/slaps
description: Wesley S.L.A.P.S. - Strategic Lock-Aware PostgreSQL System

scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path'),cp=require('child_process');let has=false;function w(d){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true})){if(e.name==='node_modules'||e.name==='dist')continue;const fp=p.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory())w(fp); else if(/\.(test|spec)\.(c|m)?[jt]sx?$/.test(e.name)) has=true;}} w(process.cwd()); if(!has){console.log('No tests found; skipping'); process.exit(0)} cp.spawnSync('vitest',['run'],{stdio:'inherit'});"

author: Wesley Authors <oss@flyingrobots.dev>
